hackthehill.xyz

Summer 2015-18

Full-Stack Web Development, Node.js, React.js, Minimum Viable Product, Product Ideation, Social Media

During the summer after my junior year, I was invited to return to Nalukai Academy in Waimea, Hawaiʻi. Returning to camp, now dubbed “Nalukai Startup Camp,” I assumed the role of mentor and leader of the camp media team.
